sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update the label for the table sys_notification_execution_log</description>
        <name>Update execution logs label</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	if (pm.isZboot())
		return;

	var dbObject = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
	dbObject.addQuery('name', 'sys_notification_execution_log');
	dbObject.query();
	if (!dbObject.next())
		return;
	
	dbObject.setValue('label', 'Execution Log');
	dbObject.setWorkflow(false);
	dbObject.update();
	
	var doc = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
	doc.addQuery('name', 'sys_notification_execution_log');
	doc.addNullQuery('element');
	doc.addQuery('label', 'Sys Notification Execution Log');
	doc.query();
	if (!doc.next())
		return;
	
	doc.setValue('label', 'Execution Log');
	doc.setValue('plural', 'Execution Logs');
	doc.setWorkflow(false);
	doc.update();

})();
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>russell.chadwick@snc</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-07-14 22:16:30</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>d2efdcc91b861410409396482b4bcb5d</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update execution logs label</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Notification Providers" source="com.glide.notification.provider">e5887ca03cf1311068bcf327dfe37f57</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_d2efdcc91b861410409396482b4bcb5d</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>russell.chadwick@snc</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-07-14 22:37:27</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
